title: Soooo, what's going to happen with item sets?
body: I don't see them in the new client, and i always found them useful.

replies.body: The team here is working on them and they should be coming in the near future.
*near future, I've heard it before too
How is it so hard to implement this feature lol.  {{champion:223}} Like i'm actually wondering?
Maybe they felt like it wasn't such an urgent matter. And they have to do it from scratch, since the new client is completely new. And maybe they want to do it better than the last one.
I know it won't happen but it would be nice to have it available for patch 7.9 with the major item mid season changes and new items which would make current item sets obsolete.
Same here.  I can still select from old Item Sets but I want to be able to make new ones and delete older ones with the new client.
